rows.label: qst006104_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, could this be...
a stone tablet from Rigideria?

rows.label: qst006104_msg0002
rows.name: Truly you are a fine salvager, Rex!

rows.label: qst006104_msg0003
rows.name:
Huh, pretty weird shape for a tablet.
What's it say?

rows.label: qst006104_msg0004
rows.name: Let's have a go at reading it, shall we?

rows.label: qst006104_msg0005
rows.name:
"Due to the appearance of the
terrible Arrogant Behemoth..."

rows.label: qst006104_msg0006
rows.name:
"The Kingdom of Rigideria perished
in a single night, Divine Beast and all."

rows.label: qst006104_msg0007
rows.name:
This Arrogant Behemoth must be a
pretty damn terrifying monster.

rows.label: qst006104_msg0010
rows.name:
Accursed beast...
How dare you harm my kingdom...

rows.label: qst006104_msg0011
rows.name:
My retainers! We must find this fell
beast that destroyed my homeland!

rows.label: qst006104_msg0012
rows.name:
Whoa there, dude. We're talking about
something that happened centuries ago.
Who says the monster's still even alive?

rows.label: qst006104_msg0013
rows.name:
Still, if we know its name, we might be
able to track it down through stories
passed down in various regions...

rows.label: qst006104_msg0014
rows.name: I think this sounds like a mercenary job.

rows.label: qst006104_msg0015
rows.name:
Agreed. That will be the most
efficient way to conduct such a
large-scale investigation.

rows.label: qst006104_msg0016
rows.name:
Very well.
Then let us begin!
